mapper.select: SELECT `LCAPResource_79f632`.`name` FROM `LCAPUserRoleMapping_79f632` INNER JOIN `LCAPRolePerMapping_79f632` ON `LCAPUserRoleMapping_79f632`.`roleId` = `LCAPRolePerMapping_79f632`.`roleId` INNER JOIN `LCAPPerResMapping_79f632` ON `LCAPRolePerMapping_79f632`.`permissionId` = `LCAPPerResMapping_79f632`.`permissionId` INNER JOIN `LCAPResource_79f632` ON `LCAPPerResMapping_79f632`.`resourceId` = `LCAPResource_79f632`.`id` WHERE `LCAPUserRoleMapping_79f632`.`userId` = #{userId}
